problem_info: A firm produces goods using raw materials with limited availability.
input_format: Number of goods, number of raw materials, available amount of each raw material, units of each raw material required per unit of each good, revenue per unit of each good.
output_info: Optimal production quantity for each good to maximize revenue.

parameters.definition: Available amount of raw material i
Units of raw material i required per unit of good j
Revenue per unit of good j
